description: Specifies how Wangscape should convert a set of terrain tiles into corner Wang tilesets.
title: Wangscape options schema

___LeftBorderModuleGroups.description: Specifies the locations of JSON files containing module groups to use to weight the left side of horizontal borders in tile generation.
___LeftBorderModuleGroups.title: LeftBorderModuleGroup schema

items.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains and the location of a JSON file containing the module group which should be used for borders connecting them.
items.title: BorderModuleGroup item schema

elements.description: Specifies a terrain by its key in the Terrains property.
elements.title: BorderModuleGroups terrain schema

___Terrains.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains for which the module group should be used
___Terrains.title: BorderModuleGroups Terrains schema

___Filename.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group for use on borders with this pair of terrains.
___Filename.title: BorderModuleGroup Filename schema

___^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+$.description: Specifies the name and texture of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.
___^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+$.title: Terrain schema

___FileName.description: Specifies the file in which the texture of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles can be found.
___FileName.title: File name schema

___OffsetY.description: Specifies the vertical offset of the terrain tile's texture in the input image, divided by the tile resolution.
___OffsetY.title: Y offset schema

___OffsetX.description: Specifies the horizontal offset of the terrain tile's texture in the input image, divided by the tile resolution.
___OffsetX.title: X offset schema

___FullName.description: Specifies the full name of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.
___FullName.title: Full name schema

___Terrains.description: Specifies the names and textures of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.
___Terrains.title: Terrains schema

___DefaultModuleGroup.description: Optionally specifies the location of a JSON file containing a default module group to use for tile centres and borders which don't have a module group specified in CentralModuleGroups, LeftBorderModuleGroups, or RightBorderModuleGroups.
___DefaultModuleGroup.title: DefaultModuleGroup schema

___TileFormat.description: Specifies the format of Wangscape's input and output tiles.
___TileFormat.title: Tile format schema

___FileType.description: Specifies the file type of Wangscape's output tiles.
___FileType.title: File type schema

___Resolution.description: Specifies the width and height of the square tiles Wangscape will operate on.
___Resolution.title: Tile resolution

___Cliques.description: Specifies terrain type sets for which corner Wang tilesets will be generated.
___Cliques.title: Cliques schema

items.description: Specifies a set of 2-4 terrain types for which a corner Wang tileset will be generated.
items.title: Clique schema

items.description: Specifies a terrain type by its key in the Terrains property.
items.title: Clique item schema

___CombinerModuleGroup.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group to use to combine border and central module groups into the corner masks used to generate tiles.
___CombinerModuleGroup.title: CombinerModuleGroup filename schema

___CentralModuleGroups.description: Specifies the locations of JSON files containing module groups to use in the centre of generated tile partitions.
___CentralModuleGroups.title: CentralModuleGroups schema

items.description: Specifies a terrain and the location of a JSON file containing the module group which should be used for the central weight of corner masks associated with that terrain.
items.title: CentralModuleGroups item schema

___Terrain.description: Specifies a terrain by its key in the Terrains property.
___Terrain.title: CentralModuleGroups terrain schema

___Filename.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group for use in tile centres with this terrain.
___Filename.title: CentralModuleGroups Filename schema

___AlphaCalculatorMode.description: Specifies which type of AlphaCalculator should be used to convert corner weights into alpha values.
___AlphaCalculatorMode.title: AlphaCalculatorMode schema

___DebugTileResolution.description: Specifies the resolution of the images written as debug data during tile generation.
___DebugTileResolution.title: DebugTileResolution schema

___AlphaCalculatorTopTwoPower.description: Specifies an exponent to which noise values should be raised before applying TopTwo or related alpha calculators.
___AlphaCalculatorTopTwoPower.title: AlphaCalculatorTopTwoPower schema

___TopBorderModuleGroups.description: Specifies the locations of JSON files containing module groups to use to weight the top side of vertical borders in tile generation.
___TopBorderModuleGroups.title: TopBorderModuleGroup schema

items.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains and the location of a JSON file containing the module group which should be used for borders connecting them.
items.title: BorderModuleGroup item schema

elements.description: Specifies a terrain by its key in the Terrains property.
elements.title: BorderModuleGroups terrain schema

___Terrains.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains for which the module group should be used
___Terrains.title: BorderModuleGroups Terrains schema

___Filename.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group for use on borders with this pair of terrains.
___Filename.title: BorderModuleGroup Filename schema

___DebugOutput.description: Specifies whether Wangscape should write debug data during tile generation.
___DebugOutput.title: DebugOutput schema

___OutputDirectory.description: Specifies the directory where Wangscape should write the output tiles (may be wiped first!)
___OutputDirectory.title: Output directory schema.

___MetaOutput.description: Specifies the filenames Wangscape will use to write meta-output.
___MetaOutput.title: Meta-output information schema

___TileData.description: Specifies the file which will contain individual details about each output tile.
___TileData.title: Tile data filename

___TileGroups.description: Specifies the file which will contain grouped arrays of details for similar tiles.
___TileGroups.title: Tile groups filename

___TilesetData.description: Specifies the file which will contain details about output tilesets.
___TilesetData.title: Tileset data filename

___TerrainHypergraph.description: Specifies the file which will contain the hypergraph of terrains which can appear in the same tile.
___TerrainHypergraph.title: Terrain hypergraph filename
